amendment.description: To increase new budget authority fiscal years 2016 and 2017 and modify outlays for fiscal years 2016 through 2022 for National Defense (budget function 050).

action.text: Amendment SA 423, as modified, ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 423, as modified, rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 68. Record Vote Number: 96.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 312(b) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 423, as modified.

Amendment SA 423 proposed by Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S1770-1773; text as modified: CR S1770) To increase new budget authority fiscal years 2016 and 2017 and modify outlays for fiscal years 2016 through 2022 for National Defense (budget function 050).

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 423, as modified, rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 68. Record Vote Number: 96.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 423 proposed by Senator Rubio.
